title: Monster Sandwich with Ranchitas Nacho Excitante
ingredients: Ketchup, mustard, mayonnaise, or sauce of your choice.
instructions: Step 1. Take a sandwich and spread mayonnaise, mustard, and ketchup (or another sauce of your choice).
Step 2. Disinfect the lettuce in a bowl with salt and let it sit for 5 minutes. Then cut it into small pieces.
Step 3. Place a small piece of lettuce on the bread and add a couple of tomato slices.
Step 4. Add ham and cheese, then top with Ranchitas Nacho Excitante.
Step 5. Repeat the same process until you have a Monster Sandwich.
description: A giant sandwich loaded with flavor and the spicy touch of Ranchitas Nacho Excitante. A unique experience!
